MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL12 postcode area of Wrexham, affecting properties in Dark Lane and surrounding streets. It will be  necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:30PM due to a faulty transformer. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 1AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:30PM on 21st March 2021
